revised_title: Observations of the Rigid Spectroscope on a Voyage to the Straits of Magellan
tldr: Captain Mayne and Mr. Connor conducted observations using a rigid spectroscope on a voyage to the Straits of Magellan. They recorded fluctuations in the spectrum, barometer, and thermometers during their journey. Their findings could help determine the effects of terrestrial gravity on the spectroscope's readings and provide valuable insights into the relationship between the barometer and the instrument.
